Title: Friends with Benefits
Plot: Susan's plans to help her husband's career backfire at the Ladies Auxiliary luncheon, but Janet is the one who makes a lasting impression. Trina runs into her old high school sweetheart at the luncheon making Tom wonder if there is more going on than just going down memory lane.
ParentalRatingReason: M Sex scenes,offensive language and drug use
GuestStars: Heidi Marnhout, Judith Hoag, Ryan McPartlin, Rachelle LeFevre, Jim O'Heir
